attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
ITV Border, based in Carlisle, appears biased towards North Cumbria and South West Scotland.
West Cumbria receives little coverage, especially in sport (you'll probably get news about a "Man found drunk in Kirkcudbright" though).
As is proposed, if we in West Cumbria are to be served by Tyne-Tees or Granada, our 'local' coverage would not be detrimentally effected.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
False or incomplete name or address information
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
